data.name: Tunche - Supporter Pack
data.detailed_description:
A real treat for everybody, who enjoys Tunche, its visuals, and music! Support the studio behind the game, and get to know the world of Tunche better with an Artbook and a full OST.


  • Artbook 'Into The World Of Tunche'

  • Full In-game Soundtrack


    Tracklist:
    1. Hub world
    2. Main Theme
    3. Mapinguari
    4. Boutu
    5. Runapuma
    6. Ukumari
    7. Final Boss
    8. Jungle
    9. River
    10. Caverns
    11. Magic World

data.short_description: A real treat for everybody, who enjoys Tunche, its visuals, and music! Support the studio behind the game, and get to know the world of Tunche better with an Artbook and a full OST.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8400, 3.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+, 3.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GT or AMD HD 3870 512MB or higher
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
